garside-raven-schöwerling/1831:59.author: REYNOLDS, Frederick
garside-raven-schöwerling/1831:59.catalogue_numbers: BL 012612.de.20; NSTC 2R7934 (BI C, Dt, O; NA DLC, MH); OCLC 4096274 (27 libs).
garside-raven-schöwerling/1831:59.notes: T.p. contains engraved vignette illustration. Dedication follows t.p., and reads: ‘To those powerful personages, who can at once make or mar an author’s hopes the Conductors of the Press, I dedicate The Dramatic Annual, simply hoping that this little work may not be deemed wholly unworthy of their notice. Should they allow that it possesses some redeeming qualities, probably they will Criticise It Indulgently. But at any rate I entreate them to Criticise It, and not suffer it to die in obscurity. Fred. Reynolds.’ Verso of dedication leaf reads: ‘The Engravings on Wood designed and created by W. H. Brooke.’ Printer’s mark and colophon of Thomas Davison, Whitefriars. Spine label of BL copy examined reads: ‘The Dramatic Annual. 1831.’
garside-raven-schöwerling/1831:59.publication: London: Longman, Rees, Orme, Brown, & Green, 1831.
